verses.verse: Then Jacob <WH3290> went on <WH5375> his journey <WH7272>, and came <WH3212> into the land <WH776> of the people <WH1121> of the east <WH6924>.

And he looked <WH7200>, and behold a well <WH875> in the field <WH7704>, and <WH7969>, behold, there were three flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629> lying <WH7257> by it <WH875>; for out of that well they watered <WH8248> the flocks <WH5739>: and a great <WH1419> stone <WH68> was upon the well <WH875>'s mouth <WH6310>.

And there were all the flocks <WH5739> gathered <WH622>: and they rolled <WH1556> the stone <WH68> from the well <WH875>'s mouth <WH6310>, and watered <WH8248> the sheep <WH6629>, and put <WH7725> the stone <WH68> again <WH7725> upon the well <WH875>'s mouth <WH6310> in his place <WH4725>.
And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto them <WH251>, My brothers, from where <WH370> be you And they said <WH559>, Of Haran are we <WH2771>.
And he said <WH559> unto them <WH3045>, Know you Laban <WH3837> the son <WH1121> of Nahor <WH5152>? And they said <WH559>, We know him <WH3045>.
And he said <WH559> unto them <WH7965>, Is he well? And they said <WH559>, He is well <WH7965>: and <WH7354>, behold, Rachel his daughter <WH1323> comes <WH935> with the sheep <WH6629>.

And he said <WH559>, Behold <WH2005>, it is yet high <WH1419> day <WH3117>, neither is it time <WH6256> that the cattle <WH4735> should be gathered together <WH622>: water <WH8248> you the sheep <WH6629>, and go <WH3212> and feed them <WH7462>.

And they said <WH559>, We cannot <WH3201>, until all the flocks <WH5739> be gathered together <WH622>, and till they roll <WH1556> the stone <WH68> from the well <WH875>'s mouth <WH6310>; then we water <WH8248> the sheep <WH6629>.
And while he yet <WH5750> spoke <WH1696> with them <WH7354>, Rachel came <WH935> with her father <WH1>'s sheep <WH6629>: for she kept them <WH7462>.

And it came to pass <WH3290>, when Jacob saw <WH7200> Rachel <WH7354> the daughter <WH1323> of Laban <WH3837> his mother <WH517>'s brother <WH251>, and the sheep <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother <WH517>'s brother <WH251>, that Jacob <WH3290> went near <WH5066>, and rolled <WH1556> the stone <WH68> from the well <WH875>'s mouth <WH6310>, and watered <WH8248> the flock <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother <WH517>'s brother <WH251>.
And Jacob <WH3290> kissed <WH5401> Rachel <WH7354>, and lifted up <WH5375> his voice <WH6963>, and wept <WH1058>.

And Jacob <WH3290> told <WH5046> Rachel <WH7354> that he was her father <WH1>'s brother <WH251>, and that he was Rebekah <WH7259>'s son <WH1121>: and she ran <WH7323> and told <WH5046> her father <WH1>.

And it came to pass <WH3837>, when Laban heard <WH8085> the tidings <WH8088> of Jacob <WH3290> his sister <WH269>'s son <WH1121>, that he ran <WH7323> to meet <WH7125> him <WH2263>, and embraced him <WH5401>, and kissed him <WH935>, and brought him to his house <WH1004>. And he told <WH5608> Laban <WH3837> all these things <WH1697>.
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> to him <WH389>, Surely you are my bone <WH6106> and my flesh <WH1320>. And he lived <WH3427> with him the space <WH3117> of a month <WH2320>.

And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> unto Jacob <WH3290>, Because you are my brother <WH251>, should you therefore serve <WH5647> me for nothing <WH2600>? tell <WH5046> me <WH4909>, what shall your wages be?
And Laban <WH3837> had two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323>: the name <WH8034> of the elder <WH1419> was Leah <WH3812>, and the name <WH8034> of the younger <WH6996> was Rachel <WH7354>.
Leah <WH3812> was weak <WH7390> eyed <WH5869>; but Rachel <WH7354> was beautiful <WH3303> and well <WH3303> favoured <WH4758>.
And Jacob <WH3290> loved <WH157> Rachel <WH7354>; and said <WH559>, I will serve <WH5647> you seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel <WH7354> your younger <WH6996> daughter <WH1323>.
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559>, It is better <WH2896> that I give <WH5414> her to you than that I should give <WH5414> her to another <WH312> man <WH376>: Stay with me <WH3427>.
And Jacob <WH3290> served <WH5647> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel <WH7354>; and they seemed <WH5869> unto him but a few <WH259> days <WH3117>, for the love he had for her <WH160>.
And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto Laban <WH3837>, Give <WH3051> me my wife <WH802>, for my days <WH3117> are fulfilled <WH4390>, that I may go in unto her <WH935>.
And Laban <WH3837> gathered together <WH622> all the men <WH582> of the place <WH4725>, and made <WH6213> a feast <WH4960>.
And it came to pass in the evening <WH6153>, that he took <WH3947> Leah <WH3812> his daughter <WH1323>, and brought <WH935> her to him <WH935>; and he went in unto her.
And Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> unto his daughter <WH1323> Leah <WH3812> Zilpah <WH2153> his maid <WH8198> for an handmaid <WH8198>.

And it came to pass <WH1242>, that in the morning, behold <WH3812>, it was Leah: and he said <WH559> to Laban <WH3837>, What is this you have done <WH6213> unto me <WH5647>? did not I serve with you for Rachel <WH7354>? wherefore then have you deceived me <WH7411>?
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559>, It must not be so done <WH6213> in our country <WH4725>, to give <WH5414> the younger <WH6810> before <WH6440> the firstborn <WH1067>.
Fulfill <WH4390> her <WH2063> week <WH7620>, and we will give <WH5414> you this also for the service <WH5656> which you shall serve <WH5647> with me yet seven <WH7651> other <WH312> years <WH8141>.
And Jacob <WH3290> did <WH6213> so <WH4390>, and fulfilled her week <WH7620>: and he gave <WH5414> him Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> to wife also <WH802>.
And Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> to Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> Bilhah <WH1090> his handmaid <WH8198> to be her maid <WH8198>.
And he went in <WH935> also unto Rachel <WH7354>, and he loved <WH157> also Rachel <WH7354> more than Leah <WH3812>, and served <WH5647> with him yet seven <WH7651> other <WH312> years <WH8141>.
And when the Lord <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that Leah <WH3812> was hated <WH8130>, he opened <WH6605> her womb <WH7358>: but Rachel <WH7354> was childless <WH6135>.

And Leah <WH3812> conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>, and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Reuben <WH7205>: for <WH3588> she said <WH559>, Surely <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> has looked <WH7200> upon my affliction <WH6040>; now therefore <WH3588> my husband <WH376> will love me <WH157>.

And she conceived <WH2029> again <WH3205>, and gave birth to a son <WH1121>; and said <WH559>, Because the Lord <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> that I was hated <WH8130>, he has therefore given <WH5414> me this son also <WH7121>: and she called his name <WH8034> Simeon <WH8095>.

And she conceived again <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and said <WH559>, Now this time <WH6471> will my husband <WH376> be joined <WH3867> unto me <WH3205>, because I have born him three <WH7969> sons <WH1121>: therefore was his name <WH8034> called <WH7121> Levi <WH3878>.

And she conceived <WH2029> again <WH3205>, and gave birth to a son <WH1121>: and she said <WH559>, Now <WH6471> will I praise <WH3034> the Lord <WH3068>: therefore she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Judah <WH3063>; and stopped <WH5975> having children <WH3205>.
